          <title>
            <string language="it">Seno</string>
            <string language="en">Sinus</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Kurve</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Sinus</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Sinus</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Κόλπος</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Sino</string>
          </title>
          <language>en</language>
          <description>
            <string language="it">La funzione seno esprime i rapporti fra il raggio del cerchio e la coordinata y.</string>
            <string language="en">The sine function expresses the relations between the radius of the circle and the y-coordinate.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="it">seno</string>
            <string language="en">sinus</string>
          </keyword>
          <structure>
            <source>structureValues</source>
            <value>linear</value>
          </structure>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Die Sinusfunktion drückt die Relationen zwischen 
dem Radius des Kreises aus und y-koordinieren Sie.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">La fonction de sinus exprime les relations entre 
le rayon du cercle et y-coordonnez.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">A função do seno expressa as relações entre o 
raio do círculo e y-coordene.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Η λειτουργία ημιτόνου εκφράζει τις σχέσεις μεταξύ της
ακτίνας του κύκλου και της Υ-συντεταγμένης.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">La función del seno expresa las relaciones entre 
el radio del círculo y y-coordine.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Kurve</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">sinus</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>

          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">κόλπος</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
